#path to tools 
# GLOBALPARAM['PATHDEF'] is the path of the script

#HTTP Proxy if needed (comment out if not)
GLOBALPARAM['HTTPPROXY']={}

#Verbose log (default value False)
GLOBALPARAM['VERBOSE']=True
GLOBALPARAM['DEBUG']=False

GLOBALPARAM['DESTDIR']="/Volumes/USBTOF3/MediaPrez"
GLOBALPARAM['LOCALROOT']="/Volumes/USBTOF3/"
GLOBALPARAM['REMOTEROOT']="../../../"
GLOBALPARAM['REMOTERELAT']=1
GLOBALPARAM['RECURSIVE']=True
GLOBALPARAM['MOVIEFILTER']=".avi,.mkv,.m4v,.mp4"
GLOBALPARAM['TAGLAN']="fr"
GLOBALPARAM['SUBLAN']="fre"
GLOBALPARAM['SCREEN_W']=1280
GLOBALPARAM['SCREEN_H']=720
GLOBALPARAM['MOVIESET']=""
